Question.Subject: Firefox page loading problems?
Question.Content: Lately after updating to the latest verson firefox, i'm getting constant page loading errors. Pages either load real slow or I get "Server not found error". I've tried everything that I can think of, clearing cache, and the open dns service but no luck. Internet Explorer works fine and chrome works a little better. I have Windows xp sp2 and the most recent avast av. any help would be appreciated. i don't have a firewall, have avast but its working fine with internet explorer
Question.ChosenAnswer: Your firewall might be blocking Firefox. Check you firewall settings to find out. XD

Answer.Content: Your firewall might be blocking Firefox. Check you firewall settings to find out. XD
yes i'm getting that too. Very frustrating. My girlfriend had the problem a few days ago too, but hers seem to have resolved itself. Hopefully whatever bug it is will fix itself soon.
